content:
1. Deathmatching mamnou3 fel LS/SF. ma3neha mato9telch 7ata 3abd fel LS/SF wala fi ay interior. les wanted criminals 3andhom el 7a9 yo9tlou les cops eli i7ebou ichedohom win je.
2. Mamnou3 bech tabusi les bugs wala t3ayen Moudarbin maknech tekel ban.
3. Mat3ayerch (tseb) ay 3abd/Staff makenech tekel mute.
4. 7awel mat9ala9ch les admins makenech tekel jail.
5. Ay mou7awla bech tethareb mel Punish tetsabeblek fi punish makther.
6. mamnou3 bech ta7ki 3la les servers lo5rin.
7. Mamnou3 bech testa3mel les hacks/Cracks fel CSG.
8. Mamnou3 bech tabusi ay naw3 mta3 bug inajem ya3tik masl7a.
9. Ma3andekch el 7a9 bech tojber la3bed bech ya3mlou/i9oulou 7aja may7ebouhech
10. lezmek ta7ki ken bel Anglais fe Main-Chat/Team Chat/Support.
11. Matcampich 9odem e sbitar.En+ Spawn kill and Spawn arrest mamnou3in.
12. mamnou3 tarresti 3abd fe event ken ki i9oul el sna3 el event tnajmou tarrestou.
13. Mathalan 3andek gang t7eb t3aref baha ekteb /advert text.
14. Spamming/Misuse Support yetsaboulek b Mute .ma3neha tjanebhom.
15. Mamnou3 bech tbi3 les comptes mte3ek l ay 3abd.
16. Lezem esmek ikoun normal,Mouch esm mta3 echhar/Spamm.
17. Trolling mamnou3 ma3neha rod belek.
18. Dima asma3 ech i9oulou les admins
